title: [Control systems] Schneider Electric security advisory (AV26-119)
description: On February 10, 2026, Schneider Electric published advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: EcoStruxure Building Operation Workstation and WebStation  7.0.x versions prior to 7.0.3.2000 (CP1)
EcoStruxure Building Operation Workstation and WebStation  6.x versions prior to 6.0.4.14001 (CP10)
SCADAPack 47x/47xi  versions prior to R3.4.2 (Firmware version prior to 9.12.2)
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
